name: Fishy Town
description:
Fishy Town is a resource manager where players will fish in order to upgrade their boats and village. Created by a small team of Game Developers called Loose Change. Expand your fishing village and become the number one fishing location. 

Game Includes:

  • Fishing
  • Currency
  • Resource Management
  • Upgrade System
  • AFK friendly

This game was made using Unity Engine with the help of two programmers and two artists. The game expands on important world issues involving fishing, and aims to grant the player insight into this issue.
